Enter the contact email address that cou: Enter the contact email address that could be displayed on search engines.
Additional Profiles to add in the <code>: Additional Profiles to add in the sameAs Schema property.
Your name or company name intended to fe: Your name or company name intended to feature in Google's Knowledge Panel.
Automatically capitalize the first chara: Automatically capitalise the first character of each word in the titles.
Choose which taxonomy you want to use wi: Choose which taxonomy you want to use with the Primary Term feature. This will also be the taxonomy shown in the Breadcrumbs when a single %1$s is being viewed.
Multiple Locations are available in the: Multiple Locations are available in the %s.
Custom values for robots meta tag on %s: Custom values for the robots meta tag on %s archives.
Custom values for the robots meta tag on %s.
Use the <code>[rank_math_contact_info]<\: Use the [rank_math_contact_info] shortcode to display contact information in a nicely formatted way. You should also claim your business on Google, if you have not already done so.
This tab contains SEO options for BuddyP: This tab contains SEO options for BuddyPress Group pages.
Specify a maximum size of image preview: Specify a maximum size of image preview to be shown for images on this page.
Specify a maximum text-length, in charac: Specify a maximum text length, in characters, of a snippet for your page.
Specify a maximum duration in seconds of: Specify a maximum duration in seconds of an animated video preview.
List of custom fields name to include in: List of custom fields names to include in the Page analysis. Add one per line.
Select custom robots meta for Group arch: Select custom robots meta for Group archive pages. Otherwise the default meta will be used, as set in the Global Meta tab.
Custom values for robots meta tag on gro: Custom values for the robots meta tag on the groups page.
Enables or disables Author Archives. If: Enables or disables Author Archives. If disabled, the Author Archives are redirected to your homepage. To avoid duplicate content issues, noindex author archives if you keep them enabled.
Enable or disable the date archives (e.g: Enable or disable the date archives (e.g: %s). If this option is disabled, the date archives will be redirected to the homepage.
Select custom robots meta for author pag: Select custom robots meta for the author page, such as nofollow, noarchive, etc. Otherwise the default meta will be used, as set in the Global Meta tab.
Custom values for robots meta tag on aut: Custom values for the robots meta tag on the author page.
Custom values for robots meta tag on dat: Custom values for the robots meta tag on the date page.
Image displayed when your page is shared: The image displayed when your page is shared on Facebook and other social networks. Use images that are at least 1200 x 630 pixels for the best display on high resolution devices.
Your current theme doesn't support title: Your current theme doesn't support title-tag. Enable this option to rewrite page, post, category, search and archive page titles.
Prevent password protected pages & posts: Prevent password protected pages & posts from getting indexed by search engines.
Default title tag for single %s pages. T: Default title tag for single %s pages. This can be changed on a per-post basis on the post editor screen.
Default description for single %s pages. This can be changed on a per-post basis on the post editor screen.
Add bulk editing columns to the post lis: Add bulk editing columns to the post listing screen.
Enter %s. Use a comma to separate multip: Enter %s. Use a comma to separate multiple IDs. Alternatively, you can enter an app ID below.
Insert personal Facebook profile URL to: Insert a personal Facebook profile URL to show Facebook Authorship when your articles are being shared on Facebook, e.g.:
Enter your complete Facebook page URL he: Enter your complete Facebook page URL here, e.g.:
Prevent search results pages from gettin: Prevent search results pages from getting indexed by search engines. Search results could be considered to be thin content and prone to duplicate content issues.
Select custom robots meta, such as <code: Select custom robots meta, such as nofollow, noarchive, etc., for single %s pages. Otherwise the default meta will be used, as set in the Global Meta tab.
Enter the Twitter username of the author: Enter the Twitter username of the author to add twitter:creator tag to posts, e.g.: RankMathSEO
Select custom robots meta, such as <code: Select custom robots meta, such as nofollow, noarchive, etc., for %s archive pages. Otherwise the default meta will be used, as set in the Global Meta tab.
Enable Link Suggestions meta box for thi: Enable the Link Suggestions meta box for this post type, along with the Pillar Content feature.
Use the Focus Keyword as the default tex: Use the Focus Keyword as the default text for the links instead of the post titles.
Enter %s. Alternatively, you can enter a: Enter %s. Alternatively, you can enter a user ID above.
Add the SEO Controls for the term editor: Add the SEO Controls for the term editor screen to customise SEO options for individual terms in this taxonomy.
Add SEO controls for the editor screen t: Add SEO controls for the editor screen to customise SEO options for posts in this post type.
Prevent all paginated pages from getting: Prevent all paginated pages from getting indexed by search engines.
Noindex Empty Category and Tag Archives: Noindex Empty Category and Tag Archives
Setting empty archives to <code>noindex<: Setting empty archives to noindex is useful for avoiding indexation of thin content pages and dilution of page rank. As soon as a post is added, the page is updated to index.
Default rich snippet selected when creat: Default rich snippet selected when creating a new product.
Google does not allow Person as the Publ: Google does not allow Person as the Publisher for articles. Organisation will be used instead. You can read more about this here.
Choose whether the site represents a per: Choose whether the site represents a person or an organisation.
Time format used in the contact shortcod: Time format used in the contact shortcode.
The price range of the business, for exa: The price range of the business, for example £££.
Select a page on your site where you wan: Select a page on your site where you want to show the LocalBusiness metadata.
Headline: Headline
Search engines may prominently display y: Search engines may prominently display your contact phone number for mobile users.
Format used when the address is displaye:
Format used when the address is displayed using the [rank_math_contact_info] shortcode.
Available Tags: {address}, {locality}, {region}, {postalcode}, {country}, {gps}
Select opening hours. You can add multip: Select opening hours. You can add multiple sets if you have different opening or closing hours on some days or if you have a midday break. Times are specified using 24:00 time.
An API Key is required to display embedd: An API Key is required to display embedded Google Maps on your site. Get it here: %s
Latitude and longitude values separated: Latitude and longitude values separated by a comma.
Change the <code>\/author\/<\/code> part: Change the /author/ part in author archive URLs.
Title tag on author archives. SEO option: Title tag on author archives. SEO options for specific authors can be set with the meta box available in the user profiles.
Author archive meta description. SEO opt: Author archive meta description. SEO options for specific author archives can be set with the meta box in the user profiles.
Default values for robots meta tag. Thes: Default values for the robots meta tag. These can be changed for individual posts, taxonomies, etc.
You can use the separator character in t: You can use the separator character in titles by inserting %separator% or %sep% in the title fields.
Title of your site when shared on Facebo: Title of your site when shared on Facebook, Twitter and other social networks.
Description of your site when shared on: Description of your site when shared on Facebook, Twitter and other social networks.
Image displayed when your homepage is sh: The image displayed when your homepage is shared on Facebook and other social networks. Use images that are at least 1200 x 630 pixels for the best display on high resolution devices.
Title tag on day\/month\/year based arch: Title tag on day/month/year based archives.
Card type selected when creating a new p: Card type selected when creating a new post. This will also be applied for posts without a card type selected.
Title tag on 404 Not Found error page.
Select custom robots meta for homepage,: Select custom robots meta for homepage, such as nofollow, noarchive, etc. Otherwise the default meta will be used, as set in the Global Meta tab.
Custom values for robots meta tag on hom: Custom values for the robots meta tag on the homepage.
Title tag on search results page.
